text: Hagi Ra Anumzana Agra Anumzamo'a amanage hie, sida zafamo'ma frino fri vahe kumapima urami'nea kna zupa, mopa agu'afima me'nea tintamina hanuge'za zavi krafa hu'za zamasunku nehanage'na, mika tintamina eri tanegahue. Anama hanige'za maka Lebanoni zafamo'za zamasunku huza zavi nete'nageno maka zafamo'za hagege hugahaze.
